body:
**Describe the solution you'd like**

Since #1597, there is now a way to provide a summary for a timer, so we should do so for internal timers we create inside the SDK

comments.body: We should probably also expose s summary on `AwaitWithTimeout` as well so the timer is creates can have specific details. For internal and external use.

title: Update internal timers to use NewTimerWithOptions and a summary
